backend/main.mo: Defines user, companion, and booking data models with access-controlled CRUD operations using authorization mixins and in‑memory maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence mapping implemented app features to specific frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten short summaries of key frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet configuring CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, global layout, guards, and theming for public and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileSta: Badge component that displays a companion profile’s status with variant‑based styling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing and fallback handling for auth errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to set their display name and saving it via backend queries.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Booking request form dialog that validates input, builds a Request object, and submits it via mutateAsync.
frontend/src/components/companions/Compa: Displays a companion’s photo, name, description, and basic info inside a clickable card linking to their profile.
Renders a gallery of images with a modal viewer supporting navigation and close controls.
frontend/src/components/compliance/AgeGa: Modal requiring users to confirm they are 18+ with accept and decline actions.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAd: Wrapper that checks authentication and admin status, showing login or denial messages before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAg: Checks local storage for age confirmation and shows the age gate modal if not verified.
frontend/src/components/guards/RequireAu: Ensures a user is authenticated, showing a sign‑in prompt if not.
frontend/src/components/layout/Editorial: Provides styled editorial layout components including section, headline, subhead, and divider.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with branding, legal links, navigation, and a dynamic attribution section.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with navigation, admin links, login button, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating and refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides auth-related React queries to fetch the caller's role and admin status and returns combined authorization state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context and provider for loading, storing, and managing user identity and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, bookings, and user profile CRUD operations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes with a luxury palette and serif font.
frontend/src/lib/errorFormatting.ts: Formats errors into user-friendly messages with special handling for common error types.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingDet: Admin page showing detailed booking info with status updates and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingsPa: Admin bookings list with filtering tabs, status badges, and navigation to detail views.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProfileEdi: Admin form for creating or editing companion profiles with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProfilesPa: Admin UI page that lists all profiles, allows navigation to create or edit pages, and supports changing profile status via a dropdown.
Displays active companion profiles with search and category filtering and renders matching companion cards.
Shows a detailed companion profile page with gallery, bio, and booking button gated by authentication.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero, feature highlights, and calls to action linking to the browse page.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPage.tsx: Privacy policy page outlining data collection, usage, storage, rights, and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/TermsDisclaimerPage.t: Terms and disclaimer page covering age requirements, legality, booking rules, and liability limits.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, assets, and current development state.
